channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Estate sign attached to actual street sign, 5th September
item.description:
A De Mel estate agent sign has been attached directly to the street sign for Cedar Court Rd. There is also, next to it, a 'Move' estate agent sign which may/may not be sited on public property/the verge, rather than on the actual property itself which is being advertised.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Montpellier Walk, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fence panels damaged and fallen down, 5th September
item.description:
///forget.wipes.bunks I have provided the what3words location as the fence is actually location in the hedge adjacent to the public footpath on the right hand side of the A435 as you approach the roundabout that stems off to Sapphire Road. I couldn't figure out in the App how to put the location unless I used a highlighted path, which is in a different location to the actual broken fence. I hope that makes sense. Sorry

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A435, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
